articles.title: COVID-19 vaccine | SA's first jab ready for trials - eNCA
articles.description: Health authorities have hosted a European Commission delegation on a tour of the Afrigen Biologics and Vaccines facility in Cape Town.
articles.content:
CAPE TOWN - South Africa's first Covid-19 jab has been designed, developed and manufactured.
It's now waiting to go on trial.
Health authorities have hosted a European Commission delegation on a to… [+255 chars]
